subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Detroit equaled an N.H.L. record with their 20th straight home win, and Nicklas Lidstrom played in his 1,550th game, the most by a player who spent his entire career with one team.
snippet: Detroit equaled an N.H.L. record with their 20th straight home win, and Nicklas Lidstrom played in his 1,550th game, the most by a player who spent his entire career with one team.
